testsuite.name: technologyRisk.DropdownSubControlNameIfTechnicalRadioButtonAndSystemAndCommunicationsProtectionOptionSelected
testsuite.system-out:
Successfully clicked on Technology Risk Assessment text on Hipaa Risk Management Page Successfully clicked on Risk Assessment on left navigation bar in technology risks page The Technical System and Communications Protection Sub Control Name Dropdown options from UI are
SECURITY ASSESSMENT AND AUTHORIZATION POLICY AND PROCEDURES SECURITY ASSESSMENTS SYSTEM INTERCONNECTIONS SECURITY CERTIFICATION PLAN OF ACTION AND MILESTONES SECURITY AUTHORIZATION CONTINUOUS MONITORING PENETRATION TESTING INTERNAL SYSTEM CONNECTIONS
